bibl.title: Notes on Texts from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: 27 notes, coming too late to be incorporated into the eighth volume of the Berichtigungsliste, where the reader will find more of the same. - P. 117 : list of words discussed in the notes. - P. Beuron sans No. d'Inv. (= S.B. I, 5806); P. Coll. privées: P. Goodspeed (= S.B. I, 4425); P. Coll. privées: P. Gradenwitz (= S.B. I, 5678); P. Paris Louvre Inv. App. 115 c (= S.B. I, 4697); App. 137 (= S.B. I, 4703); P. Stras. sans No. d'Inv. (= S.B. I, 4512); P. Würzb. Inv. K 1022 + P. Getty Museum Inv. 82 AI 76 (= S.B. XVI, 12946); T. London Univ. College sans No. d'Inv. (= S.B. III, 7115); T. Stras. Inv. 186 (= S.B. I, 5513).
VAN MINNEN Peter, Notes on Texts from Graeco-Roman Egypt.
ZPE 96 (1993) pp. 117-122, 1 arbre généal. et pl. I.
